members.name: getModifiers
members.comment: Returns the modifiers of the class.

members.name: getClassLoader
members.comment: Returns the class loader that defined the class. If the bootstrap class loader is represented as null in the Java Virtual Machine (JVM), then null is also the return value of this method.

return: the class loader defining this class, can be null

members.name: getName
members.comment: Returns the fully qualified name of the class (for example, "java.lang.String").

members.name: getId
members.comment: Returns a unique ID for the class. The ID might not be the same between Java Virtual Machine (JVM) instances.

name: jdk.jfr.consumer.RecordedClass
comment: A recorded Java type, such as a class or an interface.
